info.title: DataLakeAnalyticsJobManagementClient
info.description: Creates an Azure Data Lake Analytics job management client.

post.description: Gets the job statistics object specified by the job ID.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to get the job from

parameters.name: jobIdentity
parameters.description: JobInfo ID.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

post.description: Gets the U-SQL job debug data information specified by the job ID.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to get the job from

parameters.name: jobIdentity
parameters.description: JobInfo ID.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

post.description: Builds (compiles) the specified job in the specified Data Lake Analytics account for job correctness and validation.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to build the job for

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters to build a job, which simulates submission.

put.description: Submits the specified job to the specified Data Lake Analytics account for computation.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to create the job for

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The parameters to submit a job.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters to submit a job.

post.description: Cancels the running job specified by the job ID.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to cancel the job for

parameters.name: jobIdentity
parameters.description: JobInfo ID to cancel.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

get.description: Gets the JobInfo object specified by the job ID.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to get the job from

parameters.name: jobIdentity
parameters.description: JobInfo ID.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

get.description: Gets the first page of the Data Lake Analytics JobInformation objects within the specified resource group with a link to the next page, if any.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to get the job from

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Query parameters. If null is passed returns all JobInfo items.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Query parameters. If null is passed returns all JobInfo items.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Query parameters. If null is passed returns all JobInfo items.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Query parameters. If null is passed returns all JobInfo items.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

dataRead.description: Gets or sets the amount of data read, in bytes.

dataReadCrossPod.description: Gets or sets the amount of data read across multiple pods, in bytes.

dataReadIntraPod.description: Gets or sets the amount of data read in one pod, in bytes.

dataToRead.description: Gets or sets the amount of data remaining to be read, in bytes.

dataWritten.description: Gets or sets the amount of data written, in bytes.

duplicateDiscardCount.description: Gets or sets the number of duplicates that were discarded.

failedCount.description: Gets or sets the number of failures that occured in this stage.

maxVertexDataRead.description: Gets or sets the maximum amount of data read in a single vertex, in bytes.

minVertexDataRead.description: Gets or sets the minimum amount of data read in a single vertex, in bytes.

readFailureCount.description: Gets or sets the number of read failures in this stage.

revocationCount.description: Gets or sets the number of vertices that were revoked during this stage.

runningCount.description: Gets or sets the number of currently running vertices in this stage.

scheduledCount.description: Gets or sets the number of currently scheduled vertices in this stage

stageName.description: Gets or sets the name of this stage in job execution.

succeededCount.description: Gets or sets the number of vertices that succeeded in this stage.

tempDataWritten.description: Gets or sets the amount of temporary data written, in bytes.

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the total vertex count for this stage.

totalFailedTime.description: Gets or sets the amount of time that failed vertices took up in this stage.

totalProgress.description: Gets or sets the current progress of this stage, as a percentage.

totalSucceededTime.description: Gets or sets the amount of time all successful vertices took in this stage.

JobStatisticsVertexStage.description: The Data Lake Analytics U-SQL job statistics vertex stage information.

lastUpdateTimeUtc.description: Gets or sets the last update time for the statistics.

stages.description: Gets or sets the list of stages for the job.

JobStatistics.description: The Data Lake Analytics U-SQL job execution statistics.

jobId.description: Gets or sets the id of the job this data is for.

command.description: Gets or sets the command that this job data relates to.

paths.description: Gets or sets the list of paths to all of the job data.

JobDataPath.description: A Data Lake Analytics U-SQL job data path item.

newState.description: Gets or sets the new state the job is in.

timeStamp.description: Gets or sets the time stamp that the state change took place.

requestedByUser.description: Gets or sets the user who requests the change.

details.description: Gets or sets  the details of the audit log.

JobStateAuditRecord.description: The Data Lake Analytics U-SQL job state audit records for tracking the lifecycle of a job.

runtimeVersion.description: Gets or sets the runtime version of the U-SQL engine to use

script.description: Gets or sets the U-SQL script to run

type.description: Gets or sets the job type of the current job (i.e. Hive or U-SQL).

JobProperties.description: The common Data Lake Analytics job properties.

jobId.description: Gets or sets the job's unique identifier.

name.description: Gets or sets the friendly name of the job.

type.description: Gets or sets the job type of the current job (i.e. Hive or U-SQL).

submitter.description: Gets or sets the user or account that submitted the job.

errorMessage.description: Gets or sets the error message details for the job, if it failed.

degreeOfParallelism.description: Gets or sets the degree of parallelism used for this job. This must have a minimum value of 2

priority.description: Gets or sets the priority value for the current job which must be greater than 1.

submitTime.description: Gets or sets the time the job was submitted to the service.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the start time of the job.

endTime.description: Gets or sets the completion time of the job

state.description: Gets or sets a more detailed state of the job than the result. Especially used for intermediate states and errors

result.description: Gets or sets the result of job execution or the current result of the running job.

stateAuditRecords.description: Gets or sets the job state audit records, indicating when various operations have been performed on this job.

properties.description: Gets or sets the job specific properties.

JobInformation.description: The common Data Lake Analytics job information properties.

Job.description: Gets or sets a job information object.

JobInfoBuildOrCreateParameters.description: Data Lake Analytics job information parameters for building and submitting jobs.

value.description: Gets or sets the list of jobInfo items.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the link (url) to the next page of results.

count.description: Gets or sets the total count of results that are available, but might not be returned in the current page.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

jobServiceUriInPathParameter.name: jobServiceUri
jobServiceUriInPathParameter.description: Gets the URI used as the base for all cloud service requests.
